topic.title: 0Net n00b here -- I'm looking for Citrus on 0net
topic.body: Anyone got a link or better Anime place than I've found so far (all of which doesn't include Citrus)?

1_1Aw9Pu2t2BhjEjtFSsr29qbRJ5AroT1Ya6.body:
> [pollen](#comment_1_1JqrogiDCFGRVVrCdxwP93wurKDSgUCk4E): Play Anime is the best site here for anime, but it doesn't have Citrus either, I'm afraid.http://127.0.0.1:43110/1AnimePihDhcbVdK1nvnbSEtH4oKU8RAYG/?Home

Yup, already big fan of Play Anime, but no Citrus -- which I found weird but alright.
